item1.text: A very simple two-player chess game built using the libGDX game development framework. I made the project to specifically hone my skills with OOP

item2.text: A tutorial I followed, created by @zachgoll, where he takes a tic-tac-toe game, builds it in native JavaScript, and refactors it to TypeScript, and finally to React.

item3.text: This is a small CSS challenge from Frontend Mentor I took to improve my skills before completing this task.

item4.text: This is another small CSS challenge from Frontend Mentor I took to improve my skills before completing this task.

item5.text: I'd like to include this project because it feels like a significant accomplishment. I developed everything from scratch, starting with the design phase and ending with a fully interactive and responsive webpage. Along the way, I also learned about Liquid Templating.
